title: Ticket #1924: Remove GCB
description: Apparently no one uses GCB. It currently doesn't work, and isn't even linked into the Condor code. CCB pretty much replaces GCB and works better.
check_ins:
2012-Nov-19 10:32   Check-in [34152]: Expunge NET_REMAP_ENABLE. #1924 Comments in the code incorrectly tied CCB to the old GCB param NET_REMAP_ENABLE. CCB does not depend on this knob, and since GCB support has been removed, this knob serves no purpose. (By Dan Bradley )
2012-Jun-14 08:41   Check-in [32318]: reintroducing CCB documentation to 7.8.1, as it was inadvertently removed from the repository back in Dec 2011 when getting rid of GCB documentation. ===GT=== #1924 (By Karen Miller )
2011-Dec-16 10:53   Check-in [28827]: Remove mentions of GCB from the code After this commit, we get: $ git grep -il gcb HEAD HEAD:doc/version-history/6-7.history.tex HEAD:doc/version-history/6-9.history.tex HEAD:doc/version-history/7-0.history.tex HEAD:doc/version-history/7-1.history.tex HEAD:doc/version-history/7-3.history.tex HEAD:doc/version-history/7-5.history.tex [...] (By Nathan W. Panike )
2011-Dec-15 11:20   Check-in [28814]: Root out mentions of GCB from the manual GCB was finally removed in Condor version 7.5.6. #1924 Go through and snip out GCB mentions that did not get purged in 43925af (cherry picked from commit 9f4c65c274ed066d60b3bd855ad551d52aa8af84) (By Nathan W. Panike )
2011-Dec-15 11:17   Check-in [28813]: Eradicate GCB from the manual #1924 (cherry picked from commit 43925afd6f75bbcd249411748ef5ee3df0e2eb07) (By Nathan W. Panike )
2011-Dec-15 10:41   Check-in [28810]: Remove GCB Tests II #1924 (By Nathan W. Panike )
2011-Dec-15 10:39   Check-in [28809]: Remove GCB tests #1924 (By Nathan W. Panike )
2011-Feb-21 21:14   Check-in [20611]: ===GT=== #1924 ===VersionHistory=== Removed support for GCB (By Greg Thain )
